abstract: The former chief executive of Intel is trying to infuse the engineering discipline of Silicon Valley into the development of new medical treatments.
snippet: The former chief executive of Intel is trying to infuse the engineering discipline of Silicon Valley into the development of new medical treatments.
lead_paragraph: Andrew S. Grove, the former chief executive of Intel, is taking the next step in his quest to infuse the engineering discipline of Silicon Valley into the development of new medical treatments.

headline.main: Grove Backs an Engineer’s Approach to Medicine
